title: SAP Application Manager
description:
**Job description**
-------------------


*At Billerud we believe that when we have tomorrow in mind, we will do our very best today. It is thanks to our employees that we are a world-leading company within the field of renewable paper and packaging materials. Do you want to realize your true value and work for a sustainable tomorrow? Join us!*

  


**Are you ready to take on a key role in a stable yet evolving industry? We are seeking a proactive and skilled SAP Application Manager to join our team at Billerud.**  

  

Billerud has recently launched a group-wide program that will modernize and harmonize our working methods, which includes introducing a new ERP system. As our SAP Application Manager, known internally as Service Manager, you will be crucial for ensuring that our third-party vendor meets the required standards.

  

  

In this role, you will manage, develop, and govern the IT Maintenance support within the SAP area. You will establish and maintain active and open communication with other IT departments and requesters to ensure that delivery meets agreed needs. Reporting status, deviations, and cost follow-up to the IT object owner and steering group is also a key responsibility. You will plan, coordinate, and follow up on delivery within the area, ensuring successful delivery levels and SLAs. Additionally, you will actively work to introduce new functionality and technology within the maintenance area that adds value to Billerud.

  


**In this role, you will be responsible for:**


* Manage, develop, and govern the IT Maintenance support within the SAP area.
* Managing the IT delivery within the SAP maintenance area, acting as the operative team lead for Solution and Technical Architects, and collaborating closely with internal staff and external partners
* Ensuring successful support and delivery for the Billerud’s offshore SAP Application Maintenance support with external partner
* Establish and maintain active and open communication with other IT departments and requesters to ensure delivery meets agreed needs.
* Report status, deviations, and cost follow-up to the IT object owner and steering group.
* Plan, coordinate, and follow up on delivery within the area, ensuring successful delivery levels and SLAs.
* Actively work to introduce new functionality and technology within the maintenance area that adds value to Billerud.
* Prepare, plan, and manage the IT budget for the Maintenance area, ensuring improvements stay within the agreed budget.
* Take on the role of project manager when needed.
* Document and report all changes within the area.
* Travel in the service occurs.

  


**We are looking for multiple SAP experts, don't miss our other vacancies such as:**



SAP Datasphere & Analytics Cloud Solutions Architect



SAP Technical Architect



SAP Solution Architect (Logistics)



SAP Solution Architect (Production Planning)

  


*At Billerud, we put Safety First. Together we take great pride in our responsibility to contribute to a safe work environment. Please read more about our Safety First initiative* *here**.*


**Qualifications**
------------------



To succeed in this position, we believe you have:


* Documented IT education at Universitet level, or equivalent relevant experience.
* Experience with SAP S/4HANA and SAP solutions
* Strong leadership skills, with a background as a manager or an operative team lead
* Experience in leading and working with an Offshore Application Maintenance (AM) team
* Skilled at communicating and building relationships
* Experience in budget and financial follow-up.
* Proven experience in the design, development, and implementation of IT solutions, processes, procedures, and controls, particularly in SAP Solutions.
* Good knowledge of the paper industry and production-related IT functions is a merit.
* Professional in English, both spoken and written.
* Experience working with ITIL processes and frameworks.

  


**You will be based at any of our sites in Sweden such as Gävle, Gruvön, Frövi, Skärblacka, Karlsborg or Stockholm, Solna. Travels to our headquarter in Solna will occur.**

  



We don’t offer relocation packages and a Swedish work permit is requested for this position.


**Personal qualities**
----------------------



We place great emphasis on your personality. To thrive in this role, we are looking for someone who is skilled at communicating and creating/building trust and relationships within and outside the IT organization. You dare to challenge and take on problems, and are able to explain, convince, and be a facilitator. With a high sense of service, responsibility, stress-resistance, initiative, and communicative ability, you can prioritize effectively.

  

*Our values are very important for us and we believe that you recognize yourself in: We care for each other and We do what we say.*


**Contact**
-----------



If you would like to know more about the position, please contact Katarina Kopkin, Senior Manager Global IT Shared Applications, at katarina.kopkin@billerud.com. For more information about the recruitment process, please contact Julia Åkerlund, Talent Acquisition Partner, at julia.akerlund@billerud.com.

  



We kindly decline offers from external recruitment providers.


**Application information**
---------------------------



Welcome with your application no later than 2025-05-13. Selection may take place on an ongoing basis during this process.

  

  

Billerud is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.

  

  

**Why us?**


* Join both a local and global team of skilled professionals!An opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable future
* Development and career opportunities
* Performance-based bonus, occupational pension and a number of different benefits according to company policy.
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.

  


**Our recruitment process** will include interviews, recruitment test, reference checks, alcohol- & drug test as well as background checks.

title: SAP Technical Architect
description:
**Job description**
-------------------


*At Billerud we believe that when we have tomorrow in mind, we will do our very best today. It is thanks to our employees that we are a world-leading company within the field of renewable paper and packaging materials. Do you want to realize your true value and work for a sustainable tomorrow? Join us!*

  



Become a Key Player as an **SAP Technical Architect** at Billerud.

  



Are you ready to take on a key role in a stable yet evolving industry? Billerud has recently launched a group-wide program that will modernize and harmonize our working methods, which includes introducing a new ERP system. As our SAP Technical Architect, you will bring expert knowledge in SAP RISE, SAP S/4HANA, SAP BTP and cloud technologies and ensuring that the systems are secure, compliant and integrated with other enterprise applications.

  



We are seeking a highly skilled SAP Technical Architect to join our Global IT Shared Applications team. The successful candidate will be responsible for the overall SAP architecture and technical solutions, ensuring they align with business objectives. This role involves managing all technical aspects of SAP modules and overseeing the deployment and integration of SAP solutions.

  


**In this role, you will be responsible for:**


* Develop and maintain the overall SAP system architecture.
* Guide teams through technical challenges and ensure best practices are followed.
* Oversee the deployment of SAP solutions, including configuration and integration with other systems.
* Ensure seamless integration of SAP systems with other enterprise applications and technologies.
* Collaborate closely with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors.
* Investigate the feasibility of integrations and work closely with the Application Manager.
* Document the solution architecture in line with given standards.
* Understand the current system landscape and integrations to support our transition.
* Provide expertise and context for Billerud's SAP solutions.
* Travel is required for the role.

  


**We are looking for multiple SAP experts, don't miss our other vacancies such as:**

  

SAP Datasphere & Analytics Cloud Solutions Architect



SAP Application Manager



SAP Solution Architect (Logistics)



SAP Solution Architect (Production Planning)

  


*At Billerud, we put Safety First. Together we take great pride in our responsibility to contribute to a safe work environment. Please read more about our Safety First initiative* *here**.*


**Qualifications**
------------------



To succeed in the role of **SAP Technical Architect**, we believe you have:


* Degree in IT, Computer Science, or Computer Engineering.
* Expert knowledge in SAP, especially SAP RISE, SAP S/4HANA and SAP BTP.
* Knowledge of cloud technologies, such as Microsoft Azure.
* Solid experience with SAP implementations and technical proficiency with at least 2 full cycle SAP implementations.
* Knowledge of SAP security concepts, user roles, and compliance standards.
* Proficiency in integrating SAP systems with other enterprise applications.
* Ability to work in a cross-functional environment and collaborate effectively.
* Mastery of English, both spoken and written.

  


**You will be based at any of our sites in Sweden such as Gävle, Gruvön, Frövi, Skärblacka, Karlsborg or Stockholm, Solna. Travels to our headquarter in Solna will occur.**

  



We don’t offer relocation packages, and a Swedish work permit is requested for this position.

  


**Personal qualities**
----------------------



To thrive in this position, you are a proactive and skilled SAP Technical Architect with strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues. Effective communication is key for you, as you explain technical concepts clearly and collaborate with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors. You work well in a cross-functional environment, contributing positively to team dynamics. Adaptability is important to you, as you are comfortable working in a global environment and able to adapt to different cultures and work styles.

  


*Our values are very important for us and we believe that you recognize yourself in: We care for each other and We do what we say.*


**Contact**
-----------



If you would like to know more about the position, please contact Katarina Kopkin, Senior Manager Global IT Shared Applications, at katarina.kopkin@billerud.com. For more information about the recruitment process, please contact Julia Åkerlund, Talent Acquisition Partner, at julia.akerlund@billerud.com.

  



We kindly decline offers from external recruitment providers.


**Application information**
---------------------------



Welcome with your application no later than 2025-05-13. Selection may take place on an ongoing basis during this process.

  

  

Billerud is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.

  

  

**Why us?**


* Join both a local and global team of skilled professionals!An opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable future
* Development and career opportunities
* Performance-based bonus, occupational pension and a number of different benefits according to company policy.
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.

  


**Our recruitment process** will include interviews, recruitment test, reference checks, alcohol- & drug test as well as background checks.

title: Microsoft 365 konsult inom Modern Workplace
description:
Tillsammans med 14 andra nordeuropeiska IT-företag har vi bildat itm8, ett nytt powerhouse inom digital transformation. Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med på resan och som trivs i situationer där alla svar inte redan är givna, men du kommer att ta dig an att finna dem tillsammans med ambitiösa och drivna kollegor.
  
Today
  
Du ansvara för att leda och genomföra projekt som involverar Microsoft 365-miljöer. Att hjälpa och inspirera kunder för att optimera och effektivisera deras arbetsprocesser genom att implementera och anpassa Microsoft 365-lösningar är något du brinner för. Du kan även pitcha om AI och M365 Copilot då du har tidigare erfarenhet av att implementerat detta.
  
Att förstå kundens mål och strategier, skräddarsy en lösning med moderna arbetsplatslösningar och säkerhetslösningar inom Modern Workplace, är något du har gjort tidigare. Du känner dig bekväm med att presentera lösningen för kundens ledningsgrupp och nyckelpersoner.
  
De största utmaningarna du kommer att möta inkluderar att säkerställa en smidig övergång och datamigrering till M365, samt att hantera förändringsmotstånd inom organisationen. Det är avgörande att utbilda användarna och stödja dem i deras digitala resa för att maximera nyttan av de nya verktygen och metoderna. Informationssäkerhet och dokumenthantering är också kritiska aspekter, där du behöver säkerställa att kundens känsliga data är skyddad utan att kompromissa med användarvänligheten och samarbetet.
  
Tomorrow
  
Du har planerat ett kundbesök tillsammans med en av våra affärsutvecklare för att diskutera kundens behov av att använda Microsoft 365. Dina kunskaper gör det enkelt för dig att förklara scenariot för hur de ska flytta data och använda verktygen i Office 365 på rätt sätt.
  
Kundens ledningsgrupp är samlad och du ska presentera och inspirera i ett nytt arbetssätt med Modern Workplace med lösningar inom Microsoft 365. Arbetssättet är framtaget utifrån workshops och use cases som du kört med verksamheten under en tid och med din erfarenhet skapar du ett stort förtroende hos kunden. Informationssäkerhet och dokumenthantering är en viktig del i lösningen och ni presenterar hur kunden kan skydda sina mest känsliga informationstillgångar, samtidigt som det är enkelt att använda och samarbeta. Kunden är i stort behov av en anpassad utbildning och det är inga problem för dig att köra ett pass med deras superusers och stötta dem i deras digitala resa. Du för tydliggör vikten av att utbilda och förändringsleda verksamheten. De blev väldigt intresserade och vill starta en förstudie direkt.
  
Together
  
Under lunchen deltar du i en Lunch & Learn och lyssnar på det senaste inom Microsoft Power Platform. Nästa Lunch & Learn kan du själv hålla och du funderar redan på upplägget och hur du ska presentera dina kunskaper inom ett område du vill dela med dig av. Du gillar verkligen att sprida kunskapen vidare till dina kollegor.
  
För att du ska lyckas i din roll finns det omfattande support tillgänglig. Du har tillgång till utvecklare och andra specialister inom organisationen som kan hjälpa till med tekniska utmaningar och anpassningar efter kundens behov. Här finns ett starkt nätverk av erfarna kollegor att rådfråga och samarbeta med, vilket säkerställer att du alltid har den hjälp som behövs för att leverera de bästa lösningarna till kunderna. Creating the Difference - today, tomorrow, together itm8 är en av de ledande nordiska aktörerna inom specialistconsulting och managerade IT-tjänster för privata företag och den offentliga sektorn. Itm8 består idag av 14 företag som i en stor fusion under 2023 bildade ett powerhouse med över 1800 specialister. Tillsammans säkerställer vi de bästa tjänsterna för att bli Nordens ledande digitala transformationspartner inom Cloud, Infrastructure & Security, Digital Transformation och Application Services. itm8 finns representerat på 26 platser i Danmark, Sverige, Filippinerna samt Tjeckien.
  
Läs gärna mer om vår story, kultur och våra erbjudanden på www.itm8.se. Du är också varmt välkommen att lära känna oss mer på Instagram @itm8inside.
  
Redo att utmana(s) med itm8?
  
Varmt välkommen att ansöka till tjänsten nedan. Om du inte är redo att ansöka än och har frågor, skriv till oss i meddelanderutan nedan så följer vi upp med dig. Alla ansökningar och kontakter behandlas konfidentiellt. Vi kontaktar kandidater löpande så vi rekommenderar att du ansöker till tjänsten så snart du kan.
  
På itm8 är vi övertygade om att mångfald berikar oss och driver innovation framåt. Vi välkomnar därför sökanden av alla kön, bakgrunder och livserfarenheter. Hos oss hittar du en arbetsgivare som värdesätter och uppmuntrar unika perspektiv och idéer. Oavsett vem du är eller varifrån du kommer, om du delar vår passion för teknik och kundrelationer, vill vi höra från dig. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan och chansen att möjligen välkomna dig till vårt team!

title: Data Scientist
description:
Are you our next Data Scientist?
  
At Nabla Analytics, we're transforming energy trading through intelligent data solutions. Our platform helps renewable energy companies maximize revenue, minimize risk, and reduce carbon emissions. We see our products as a key part of the green energy revolution and our customers operate a capacity of over 1GW of wind, solar and batteries. Founded in 2020, we currently have customers across several European countries and we're looking for exceptional talent to further fuel our growth.
  
About the role
  
As our Data Scientist, you'll harness your determination, skills, energy and creativity to generate actionable insights for our customers. Data is central to everything we do, and your expertise will ensure our models deliver accurate, real-time information that drives decision-making and trading strategies.
  
  

**As a Data Scientist, you will:**  

Develop and maintain our in-house forecasts that power our energy trading insights
  
Build and refine data pipelines to ensure clean, robust, and timely datasets
  
Champion best practices in ML and CI/CD within a fast-paced production environment
  
Continuously optimize algorithms and analytics frameworks for performance and scalability
  
  

About you
  
  

**An ideal candidate has:**  

A background in building or working with ML/AI-driven products (SaaS or data-focused experience is a plus)
  
A desire to make a positive impact through innovative technology in a mission-driven startup
  
Entrepreneurial mindset that thrives in a collaborative environment
  
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate complex analyses into actionable insights for our customers
  
Ambition and creativity (and a sense of humour!)
  
  

**Your tech stack:**  

Proficient in Python for data analysis and model development
  
Strong knowledge of databases (SQL/PostgreSQL or similar)
  
Experience with cloud services (AWS/GCP/Azure) for deploying and scaling ML solutions
  
  

**Experience in the following is a plus:**  

Energy industry or B2B sectors
  
Dashboarding and visualization tools
  
Time series Forecasting (statistical/ML)
  
End-to-end MLOps, from model training to deployment
  
  

**What we offer:**  

Stock options
  
Flexible hybrid-remote working
  
Direct customer impact - see your work make an immediate difference
  
Build products that add value and save the planet (not just getting people to click on ads!)
  
  

How to Apply
  
You can apply for this role through LinkedIn or by emailing your CV and a brief description of yourself and why you are interested in this role. Alternatively, if you would like more details before applying you can email us your questions. Nabla Analytics is committed to building a diverse and inclusive team. We evaluate candidates based on merit and potential, regardless of background. We are looking forward to your application!

title: SDM till snabbväxande techbolag i framkant!
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning:**


Vår kund är ett ledande IT-tjänsteföretag i Stockholm, känt för sin snabba tillväxt och innovativa molnbaserade lösningar. Specialiserade inom Microsoft Cloud, inklusive Microsoft Azure, Microsoft 365 och Dynamics 365, strävar de efter att leverera överlägsna IT-lösningar som är skräddarsydda för kundernas specifika behov. Med ett engagerat team av säljare och supportpersonal säkerställer de högsta nivåer av servicekvalitet och optimal prestanda.

 **Arbetsbeskrivning:**


I rollen som SDM (Solution Delivery Manager) kommer du att agera teknisk förvaltare och vara huvudkontakt för en specifik grupp kunder. Du fångar upp kundens tekniska behov, hanterar frågor och utmaningar samt driver projekt för att säkerställa att lösningarna matchar deras specifika miljö. Du kommer även att ingå i månadsavstämningar och övervaka SLA för att garantera att företaget levererar i linje med kundernas förväntningar. Du ansvarar för teknisk rådgivning och utbildning för att optimera användningen av produkterna och tjänsterna.

 **Dina arbetsuppgifter:**

* Bygga och underhålla starka och långsiktiga kundrelationer.
* Fånga upp kundernas tekniska frågor och utmaningar.
* Driva projekt med och åt dina kunder.
* Hantera och lösa tekniska problem och utmaningar i nära samarbete med kunden.
* Ge teknisk rådgivning och utbildning för att optimera användningen av produkter och tjänster.
* Övervaka och rapportera på kundens tekniska prestanda och användning av lösningarna.
* Samordna och leda tekniska möten och presentationer för kunder.

 **Kvalifikationer:**

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av teknisk kundsupport eller teknisk projektledning.
* Erfarenhet av att ha ansvar för kunder samt att föra kunddialoger.
* Djup förståelse för Microsoft 365, SharePoint, Teams, Entra och Windows Server/Klient.
* Grundläggande nätverkskunskaper.
* Förmåga att kommunicera tekniska idéer tydligt och pedagogiskt.
* Starka problemlösningsfärdigheter och förmåga att hantera krävande situationer.
* God förmåga att arbeta strukturerat och leda ditt eget arbete.

 **Ort:** Stockholm

**Start:** Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid

 **Ansökan:**


Vårt Talent Acquisition-team ser gärna att du som söker har goda referenser samt ett välarbetat CV som specificerar tidigare erfarenheter och utbildning inom området. Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt, då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrunder och erfarenheter, eftersom vi vet att mångfald berikar och stärker vårt arbete. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt system. Vid frågor, kontakta **maria@linden-it.se**.

title: Head of Marketing & Comms BCSS
description:
**About the Opportunity:**

  

Ericsson Cloud Software & Services (BCSS) provides industry-leading solutions for Core Network and Automation, Managed Services, Services Orchestration, and Telecom BSS. We enable communication service providers to transition to cloud-native software and automated operations, preparing their networks for the future.

  

Business Area Cloud Software and Services (BCSS) consists of around 31 000 employees that are operating in many countries supporting our global customers across 180 geographies.

  

We’re looking for an inspiring leader with experience of developing and implementing impactful marketing and communications strategies that help BCSS business growth. Comfortable working in a fast paced, agile, and tech & creative focused environment, you, as the ideal candidate will have an extensive experience within your area of responsibility. You will build trust and work closely in cross functional topics with your colleagues in BCSS leadership team. You will also work in close collaboration with a broad set of external stakeholders such as customers, media, regulators and government representatives, partners etc.  

  

You will lead a team of Marketing and Communications professionals on building BCSS awareness and perception, supporting sales growth and enabling BA transformation leveraging the areas in scope for the unit. You are also the communications advisor to BCSS Head and Leadership team working to ensure that BCSS acts true to its ambitions of clear, transparent, and consistent communication with its stakeholders and employees.

  

As a senior leader and a member of the BCSS and the Global Marketing and Communications leadership teams, the successful candidate will need to demonstrate a strong ability to manage change, inspire, innovate, drive for efficiency, automation, and digitalization, collaborate, be result oriented, a problem-solver in a highly fast-paced, geographically diverse matrix organization working with the latest technologies of Telecom.

  

The location of this role is preferably at our headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden. At Ericsson, we follow an office-first approach, so most of your time will be spent working face-to-face with colleagues in the office.

 **What you will do:**

* Enable sales growth and business evolution by executing Marketing and Communication strategic priorities.
* Develop Marketing and Communication plans to achieve BCSS business goals.
* Act as marketing and communications advisor to BCSS Leadership team.
* Ensure clear, transparent, and consistent communication to BCSS stakeholders and employees.
* Drive contemporary portfolio marketing for BCSS solutions, manage engagement marketing activities with BCSS customer community
* Establish efficient employee communication, aligned with overall employee communications strategy and priorities, to build awareness, drive change management, secure leadership support and employee engagement, build a strong Ericsson culture, engagement, and confidence internally
* In close collaboration with the Group Function Marketing and Communications, drive external communications, campaigns, events relevant for BCSS.
* Secure global Marketing and Communications strategy implementation
* Support GF Marketing and Communications in matters relating to Corporate Communications and Investor Relations, including support in managing the company’s reputation
* Collaborate with Marketing and Communications Business Area & Market Area counterparts, global functional leads in the Group Function team, for efficiency and effectiveness in execution
* Build and continuously evolve BCSS Marketing and Communications team capabilities, enhance functional competence and business acumen, as well as foster a continuous learning.


  

**What you will bring:*** Excellent knowledge and understanding of the telecom industry advantageous – and ability to turn that knowledge into effective and efficient targets and strategies within areas of responsibility.
* Strong interest and ability to interact with customers and other relevant external stakeholders.
* At least 10 years of relevant senior experience in Marketing & Communications area or possibly in adjacent relevant areas
* Knowledge in Corporate reputation, Media relations, Internal Communications, Brand strategy, Customer Engagement Marketing, Digital Marketing
* Strategic approach, understanding business complexities
* Excellent analytical capabilities, with the ability to translate data into action and to use data to develop and measure Market & Communications programs for Cloud & Software Services.
  

Leadership:

* Senior leadership background and proven ability to understand and navigate complex situations and environments
* Excellent collaboration skills and ability to interact with both internal and external stakeholders
* Very strong personal integrity and ability to handle sensitive and confidential information
* Strong ability to coach and advise Ericsson senior leaders, especially the Executive Team, on matters relating to Marketing & Communications areas of responsibility
* Excellent communication skills – in writing and verbally
* Strong ability to engage, lead, influence and inspire both the BCSS Marketing and Communications team and Market Area & Group Function counterparts
* Strong ability to develop the global function to build new capabilities, ie digital skills
* Solution oriented personality with a strong focus on results & outcomes.
* Change-driver - Open to new ideas, accepts challenges and leads with optimism; considers culture and understands how to implement culture change.


  

Minimum Requirements:* University degree in PR, Marketing, Communications, Business, or equivalent training/experience.
* Proven functional track record, with reasonable large leadership responsibility, preferably in diverse businesses and cultural/geographic settings.

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

**Req ID:** 765848

title: Commercial Contract Manager
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------

  

**About this Opportunity**  

As a global cellular networking leader, Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions is extending Ericsson’s mission to enterprises and agencies throughout the world. While our experience and expertise are vast, it’s actually our people and culture that set us apart. We hope you can join our community of authentic, hard-working individuals who embrace challenges and think outside the box to create unprecedented solutions. We’ve always been humble and hungry, and it clearly shows in the Ericsson culture that fosters collaboration, values diversity, and empowers you to make a real difference — both in the world of connectivity and in the lives of those around you.  

The Commercial Contract Manager is a pivotal role responsible for the management and administration of all commercial contracts within our organization. This role involves developing, negotiating, and executing new contracts, as well as managing existing ones to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations. The Commercial Contract Manager will collaborate closely with Sales, Commercial Management, and Legal teams to optimize contract performance and mitigate risks.

 **What you will do**  

* Develop and negotiate new commercial contracts in conjunction with Sales and Commercial Management.
* Execute new contracts and manage existing ones, including building and implementing a migration plan for transitioning current contracts into the new commercial model.
* Act as a core participant in responding to Requests for Information (RFI) and Requests for Proposal (RFP).
* Collaborate with the Legal team to develop a contract framework for establishing internal commercial agreements, specifically for Ericsson Local Companies – Market Areas and Customer Units relationships.
* Consult with the Legal team to ensure compliance of all commercial contracts with applicable laws and regulations.
* Work with the commercial team to identify, assess, and mitigate contract risks.
* Manage the contract lifecycle, from initiation through to termination, ensuring smooth transitions and effective execution.
* Provide support and guidance to the commercial team on contract-related matters.
* Manage contract changes and amendments, ensuring that all modifications are documented and compliant with company policies and legal requirements.
* Stay informed about the latest laws and regulations governing commercial contracts and apply this knowledge to the role.
 **What you will bring**  

* University degree in business administration, law, engineering or a related field.
* Several years of experience in commercial contract management.
* Strong understanding of commercial contracts and the commercial industry.
* Excellent negotiation and communication skills.
* Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously in a dynamic environment.
* Experience in Cloud and SaaS platforms, subscription-based packaging, and recurring revenue models is desirable.
* World Commerce & Contracting certification is a plus
* Proficiency in English both written and oral are a must, additional languages are an asset
* Willingness to travel up to ten percent (<10%).
 **Application**  

We look forward to your application with CV in English. We target 60% work-from-office.  

Last day to apply: 29th of April 2025  

Please note that we do not accept, proceed, or respond for applications sent via e-mail.


If you have specific questions, you are welcome to contact Raheleh Rouhani, Sr. Talent Acquisition Partner at raheleh.rouhani@ericsson.com


Location: Stockholm, Sweden or Reading, UK.

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Head of People (Cloud & Software Services)
description:
**About the Opportunity:**

  

Ericsson Cloud Software & Services (BCSS) provides industry-leading solutions for Core Network and Automation, Managed Services, Services Orchestration, and Telecom BSS. We enable communication service providers to transition to cloud-native software and automated operations, preparing their networks for the future. We’re a global team of 31,000 operating in many countries supporting our global customers across 180 geographies.

  

Reporting to the Head of BCSS, the Head of People BCSS is accountable to create and implement the BCSS People Strategy to support the achievement of our business strategy. The Head of BCSS People takes decisions on how we best attract, develop, manage, and retain the talent needed across all global sites to execute on our business strategy. This role will advise and collaborate with the Head of BCSS and the BCSS leadership team to create strategies that address challenges related to external factors such as technological changes and geopolitics, as well as internal factors such as shifts in capabilities and site strategies. These efforts are essential for BCSS's success.

  

The Head of People BCSS will be part of both the BCSS and Ericsson Global People leadership teams. Working in a matrix structure, this position requires strong stakeholder management and influencing skills. Additionally, with EGI organization being within BCSS, the Head of BCSS People will ensure that our People Strategy in India matches what India market requires to attract and retain the best talent.

  

The location of this role is preferably at our headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden. At Ericsson, we follow an office-first approach, so most of your time will be spent working face-to-face with colleagues in the office.

 **What you will do:**

  

* Collaborate closely with the BCSS Leadership team and global People team to identify key people priorities and develop and implement solutions to address these, while adhering to high standards of ethics and compliance.
* Support the Head of BCSS as a trusted advisor and challenger, offering recommendations to drive change within the organization, raising the bar on both performance and leadership.
* Develop, and when needed, quickly adapt our strategic people direction, referencing our breadth of operations, strengths, challenges, opportunities, and geographic characteristics, and translate these into an effective people strategy.
* Build and lead a strong BCSS People organization, acting as advisors and coaches to align employee efforts with the broader BCSS organization's business strategy.
* Lead the creation and execution of the People Strategy for Ericsson India, ensuring we remain a top choice for talented individuals in India.
* Manage relationships with Global People Heads across different organizational dimensions to ensure strong collaboration while ensuring BCSS’s needs are addressed in the Global People strategy and initiatives.

 **What you will bring:**

  

Key Attributes:

* Excellence in working with people and an aptitude to motivate, engage, develop listen to and inspire the team.
* Execute and drive continuous change based on customer feedback, employee input and feedback as well as global improvement programs.
* Role model courageous leadership; curious and willing to challenge the status quo.
* Excellent coaching skills, ability to foster and maintain strong relationships across the organization.
* Experienced in navigating complexity and ambiguity.
* Ability and experience of managing multi country, diverse teams, and cultures, and within a matrix structure.
* Effective communication, collaboration, problem-solving and analytical skills.
* High integrity with a strong focus on compliance and the ability to foster a speak-up culture.

  

Leadership:

* Creates clarity (decision making, delegation, strategic leadership, impact & influence, active listening, emotional intelligence).
* Develops people (constructive feedback, coaching, empathetic, employee motivation).
* Deliver results (accountability, performance review, leading & developing high performing teams, adaptability, resilience & perseverance, team motivation).

  

Minimum Requirements:

* A bachelor’s degree or higher in Human Resources, Business Administration or Social Sciences or a related discipline.
* Senior experience in Human Resources leadership, with reasonable large leadership responsibility, preferably in diverse businesses and cultural/geographic settings.

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Microsoft 365 Specialist
description:
Är du en passionerad Microsoft 365-expert som brinner för att skapa en effektiv och modern digital arbetsplats? Vi söker en engagerad och tekniskt skicklig Microsoft 365 Specialist som vill spela en nyckelroll i att optimera vår kunds IT-miljö.
   

  

 I denna roll ansvarar du för att administrera, underhålla och vidareutveckla Microsoft 365-plattformen, inklusive Exchange, Teams och SharePoint. Du kommer även att utbilda Servicedesk, stödja det globala onsite-supportteamet och bygga komplexa SharePoint-webbplatser för kommunikation och intressenthantering.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter:**
* Driva process- och arbetsförbättringar inom M365-området.
* Implementera och leda interna IT-projekt kopplade till IT-arbetsplats och Microsoft 365.
* Hantera och lösa avancerade supportärenden (L3) samt dela kunskap med L1/L2-teamet.
* Analysera och identifiera rotorsaker vid återkommande tekniska problem.
* Stödja utvecklingen av strategin för O365-plattformen tillsammans med Head of IT, Service Desk och Digital Workplace-teamet.
* Samarbeta med interna och externa stakeholders såsom Microsoft, Microsoft-partners och konsulter.


**Din profil:**
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet som specialist inom Microsoft 365 (Exchange, Teams, SharePoint).
* God teknisk kompetens inom Azure.
* Erfarenhet av incidenthantering och eskalationsprocedurer enligt ITIL.
* Erfarenhet av systemadministration inom O365 samt hantering av L2- och L3-ärenden.


**Vi tror att du är:**
* Teknikintresserad och lösningsorienterad.
* Självgående, driven och effektiv i ditt arbete.
* Prestigelös, flexibel och kreativ med en vilja att utvecklas.
* Serviceinriktad och kommunikativ med god förmåga att förmedla teknisk information.
* Flytande i engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* En lagspelare med god analytisk förmåga som gärna delar med sig av sin kunskap.


**Om CONSULTING it:**
 När du börjar hos oss som konsult på CONSULTING it blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får dessutom kollegor runt om i Sverige! Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stöttar dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver. Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i ditt nästa, nästa och nästa steg. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**ob description:** 




**The primary tasks for a Machine Learning Engineer in MLE area are:** 



* **Develop AI/ML software products including but not limited to explore large data set, try out new algorithms, feature engineering, test and evaluate model output, deploy the solution for production usage and scale out to the comprehensive fashion network of the company**
* **Design, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.**
* **Leverage on understanding of software architecture and software design patterns to write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.**
* **Develop solutions, components, services and frameworks to address common needs in AI/ML projects, like feature reuse, model traceability, A/B test, etc.**
* **Work in cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, business stakeholders to build the AI ecosystem within the company.**



**Required skills and experiences:** 



* **Have a BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.**
* **Have 4+ years’ professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a Machine Learning Engineer.**
* **A hands-on person who loves coding, and like applying software engineering practices to machine learning projects.**
* **Have experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production.**
* **Have several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 3+ years.**
* **Have great experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud and also Vertex AI.**
* **Have solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, and deploying ML applications to production.**
* **Have a strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.**
* **Have experience handling high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream) and a solid understanding of data structures, databases, and data storage technologies.**
* **Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration, data-driven development, reliable and responsible experimentation.**
